answer:
1) Related Views of Distributor, MPAA_Rating and Worldwide Gross - Gives an insight on the type of movies that certain distributors are successful in.
2) Production Budget, Release Date and Running_Time_min - The relation between a movie being successful and the running time, with the timeline taken into consideration.
3) Creative type, Director and Worldwide gross - Indicates the creative types certain directors has been successful in.
